header.title: About Evally
header.subtitle: Pioneering the application of AI to revolutionize Vietnam's education system

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Evally was born with the mission to democratize educational assessment through advanced AI technology. We believe every student deserves fair, accurate, and timely evaluations to help them reach their fullest potential.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: To become Southeast Asia's leading AI platform in educational assessment, contributing to raising educational quality and nurturing a generation of critical thinkers, innovators, and future-ready individuals.

story.title: Our Story
story.part1: Evally was founded in 2023 by a group of AI engineers and education experts who shared a passion for improving the education system. It stemmed from the realization that teachers spent too much time on grading instead of focusing on teaching and engaging with students.
story.part2: After two years of research and development, we created an AI system capable of understanding and assessing student work as accurately as humans, even surpassing them in consistency and objectivity. Our system not only grades but also provides detailed feedback to help students understand their strengths and areas for improvement.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: We constantly strive to deliver the best product for our users.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.desc: Working closely with teachers and students to understand real needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Pioneering the use of the latest technologies in education.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.intro: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

section1.title: 1. Use of the Service
section1.content: You agree to use the service in compliance with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations.

section2.title: 2. Account Responsibilities
section2.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and all activities that occur under your account.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.content: All content, trademarks, and data on this site, including but not limited to software, databases, text, graphics, icons, and hyperlinks are the property of Evally or its licensors.

section4.title: 4. Termination
section4.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach the Terms.

section5.title: 5. Disclaimer of Warranty
section5.content: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. We disclaim all warranties of any kind.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: In no event shall Evally be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages arising out of your access to or use of the service.

section7.title: 7. Changes to Terms
section7.content: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of the service after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

policy.title: Privacy Policy
policy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect personal information that you provide to us directly, as well as data collected automatically such as browser type, IP address, and usage data.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, personalize user experience, and ensure platform security.

section3.title: 3. Sharing of Information
section3.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share it with third-party service providers for the purposes of platform functionality, analytics, or compliance.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
section5.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though some features may not function properly.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time by contacting our support team.

section7.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
section7.content: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. Continued use of our services after changes are posted indicates your agreement to the revised policy.
